name: Zaharia, a fantasy RPG inspired by Middle Eastern world
blurb: Zaharia is a fantasy RPG, inspired by Middle Eastern and Asian cultures, full of reactive choices and exciting adventures.

rewards.reward: No Reward

NOMAD TIER (DIGITAL)
============================= 
You will get a personal mail with our thanks, 3 special Kickstarter Digital Wallpapers and the Digital Map of the Zaharian Empire.
(Approximately $3 - €3)

TRAVELER TIER (DIGITAL)
============================= 
EARLY BIRD - ONLY 250 AVAILABLE!
============================= 
You will get everything from the NOMAD TIER plus a digital copy of Zaharia (PC, Mac, Linux - DRM Free) at a very low price, with the Digital Manual and a exclusive in-game Easter Egg. (Approximately $12 - €10)
============================= 
This special tier is limited to 250 units!

CITIZEN TIER (DIGITAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the NOMAD TIER plus a digital copy of Zaharia (PC, Mac, Linux - DRM Free) at a low price, with the Digital Manual and a exclusive in-game Easter Egg. (Approximately $19 - \u20ac14)
WATCHMAN TIER (DIGITAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the CITIZEN TIER plus the Digital Soundtrack (mp3 and flac). (Approximately $26 - \u20ac19)

MERCHANT TIER (DIGITAL)
============================= 
You will get everything from the WATCHMAN TIER plus the Zaharian Digital Cookbook (pdf) and an exclusive Kickstarter Vanity in-game Item. (Approximately $32 - €24)
============================= 
(Note: the Vanity Item will only have aesthetical purposes and won't affect the balance of the game.)

LIBRARIAN TIER (DIGITAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the MERCHANT TIER plus a pack of high resolution digital Wallpapers, the digital Extra Contents of Zaharia and the digital Novella, featuring a story settled in the world of Zaharia. (Approximately $39 - \u20ac28)

ENGINEER TIER (DIGITAL)
============================= 
You will get everything from the LIBRARIAN TIER plus the digital Artbook, the exclusive Kickstarter Vanity Items Set and the Digital Wallpapers Collection (which includes the Kickstarter Wallpapers reward). (Approximately $48 - €36)
============================= 
(Note: the Vanity Items Set replaces the single Vanity Item reward. The items will only have aesthetical purposes and won't affect the balance of the game.)

ALCHEMIST TIER (PHYSICAL)
============================= 
You will get the Premium Edition, a limited boxed edition of the Zaharia which includes the Printed Manual, the Printed Map, two Printed Posters, the Exclusive Kickstarter Vanity Item, the in game Easter Egg, the Digital Wallpapers Collection and the digital Zaharian Cookbook. (Approximately $65 - €48)
============================= 
(Note: the Vanity Item will only have aesthetical purposes and won't affect the balance of the game.)

ASTRONOMER TIER (DIGITAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the ENGINEER TIER plus an addictional digital copy of Zaharia, the early access to the beta of Zaharia, the digital Comic Book, featuring a story settled in the world of Zaharia. You will also be in the credits of Zaharia. (Approximately $81 - \u20ac60)

ARCHITECT TIER (DIGITAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the ASTRONOMER TIER plus the Digital Maps Set (which includes the Digital Map reward) and a High Resolution Digital Concept Art from the art team as they work on the setting. (Approximately $88 - \u20ac65)

WARRIOR MONK TIER (PHYSICAL)
============================= 
You will get everything from the ALCHEMIST TIER plus the exclusive Kickstarter Vanity Items Set, the Digital Soundtrack of Zaharia (mp3 and flac), the Digital Extra Contents, the Digital Novella and the Digital Artbook. You will also be in the credits of Zaharia. (Approximately $97 - €72)
============================= 
(Note: the Vanity Items Set replaces the single Vanity Item reward. The items will only have aesthetical purposes and won't affect the balance of the game.)

GOVERNOR TIER (DIGITAL)
============================= 
You will get everything from the ARCHITECT TIER plus a third digital copy of Zaharia and your name will be in the game as the name of a soldier fallen during the War of Independence. (Approximately $106 - €78)
============================= 
(Note: the name may need to be changed a little in order to have a Zaharian sound.)

COUNCILMAN TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the WARRIOR MONK TIER plus a digital copy of Zaharia, the Digital Maps Pack and the Digital Comic Book. You will also be in a special section of the credits of Zaharia. (Approximately $114 - \u20ac84)

INQUISITOR TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get the Collector's Edition, a limited luxury boxed edition of Zaharia which includes the Printed Manual, the Printed Artbook, the Printed Map, the Printed Comicbook, the Physical Soundtrack, the Physical Extra Contents, 3 Printed Posters, the Digital Maps Pack, the Vanity Items Set, The Digital Comicbook, the Digital Novella, the Digital Soundtrack, the Digital Extra Contents, the Digital Zaharian Cookbook, the Digital Artbook, the early acces to the Beta of Zaharia, the Digital Wallpapers Collection, the in-game Easter Egg and your name will be in the game as the name of a soldier fallen during the War of Independence. (Approximately $163 - \u20ac120)

GRAND COMMANDER TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything from the INQUISITOR TIER plus a High Resolution Digital Concept Art and your name will be in the game as the name of an important citizen buried in the Cemetery of Ashantir. You will also be able to design an item and its story with the help of the team. (Approximately $187 - \u20ac138)

MASTER OF ARTS TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the GRAND COMMANDER TIER plus 5 digital copies of Zaharia, your Collector's Edition will be signed by the team and you will be able to design an item and its story with the help of the team. You will also be in a special gold section of the credits of Zaharia. (Approximately $269 - \u20ac198)

FIRST AMBASSADOR TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the MASTER OF ARTS TIER but instead of an item you will be able to design an NPC and its story. (Approximately $285 - \u20ac210)

GRAND MASTER OF THE IMPERIAL GUARD (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the FIRST AMBASSADOR TIER plus an important government member, a Councilman, will have your face. (Approximately $326 - \u20ac240)

GRAND MAGISTRATE TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the FIRST AMBASSADOR TIER plus the Printed Novella Signed, the art team will sign the Printed Artbook and you won't only design a NPC, but also his residence. (Approximately $490 - \u20ac360)

IMPERIAL ARCHMAGE TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the GRAND MAGISTRATE TIER but instead of the Design an NPC and his Residence reward you will design an epic item and its story. You will also be able to put your name on a spell and discuss its design features with the team. Your name will be also featured in the game as the name of a legendary Zaharian hero. (Approximately $650 - \u20ac480)

MASTER OF SPIES TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the IMPERIAL ARCHMAGE TIER plus you will get 10 digital copies of Zaharia and you will be part of a political intrigue: we will use your face in game and you will be able to choose your side in the intrigue and the various actions that your NPC will do according to the player's actions.(Approximately $815 - \u20ac600)

HERO TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the MASTER OF SPIES TIER (except for the Name a Spell reward) plus you will design an in-game residence that the PC will be able to buy and you will have the Treasure Reward, that will allow you to design a treasure that will be a reward for a quest (Approximately $980 - \u20ac720)

EMPEROR TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the HERO TIER (except for the Design an Epic Artifact reward) plus a special Garden dedicated to you in Ashantir, a special Monument dedicated to you, you will be able to request to our artists unique and personal artwork and you will design an entire party of NPCs and their story, with the aid of our team. (Approximately $1220 - \u20ac900)

PROPHET TIER (PHYSICAL)\r\n============================= \r\nYou will get everything in the HERO TIER but instead of a simple residence you will design a Luxury Residence that the PC will be able to buy in the game. You will also be able to request to our artists a unique and personal artwork of superior quality, you will design an Epic Artifact, an important NPC and his residence and a NPC party. We will also create a magnificent Monument in game to thank you and invite you to the launch party of Zaharia (Note: you will need to take care of the travel to Rome personally). (Approximately $1630 - \u20ac1200)
